channel.title: AncientDragonLand - 317 PvP Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://ancientdrangonland.com/server/imgs/logo.png[/img] [/CENTER]
[SIZE=5][CENTER][COLOR="#0000CD"] [URL=http://"http://ancientdrangonland.com"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://ancientdrangonland.com/index.php?action=play"]Play ADL Now[/URL] [URL=http://"http://ancientdrangonland.com/server/ancientdragonland.jar"]Download ADL Client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://ancientdrangonland.com/index.php?board=18.0"]Knowledge Base[/URL] [/COLOR][/CENTER][/SIZE] [SIZE=4]Welcome to AncientDragonland Our goal is to make a server based on the community's thoughts it appears most server players don't have a choice for what content is being added to the server, This is where we come in We have a system setup so players can get there suggestions added to the server if the rest of the community likes the idea, First They post a thread explaining everything they can about the idea, Then we let the community view/comment on those threads players make for a total of 1 week before the thread gets locked, if players want it, but small changes to it thats fine to, we then put a poll up and only admins + can create threads on poll thread, The poll is then placed in every page of the forum, so players are for sure going to see it. SO COME ON A TRY ADL![/SIZE]
[CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR="#FF0000"]OLDER IMAGES[/COLOR][/SIZE][IMG]http://ancientdrangonland.com/server/imgs/1.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://ancientdrangonland.com/server/imgs/2.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://ancientdrangonland.com/server/imgs/3.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://ancientdrangonland.com/server/imgs/4.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://ancientdrangonland.com/server/imgs/5.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://ancientdrangonland.com/server/imgs/6.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://ancientdrangonland.com/server/imgs/7.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://ancientdrangonland.com/server/imgs/8.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://ancientdrangonland.com/server/imgs/9.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://ancientdrangonland.com/server/imgs/10.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://ancientdrangonland.com/server/imgs/11.PNG[/img]
[SIZE=7][COLOR="#00FFFF"]NEW CONTENT[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Updates Log : [URL=http://"http://ancientdrangonland.com/index.php?topic=13"]Link to Updates log thread[/URL] Pet Boss System : [URL=http://"http://ancientdrangonland.com/index.php?topic=17.0"]Link to Pet Boss System Details[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][COLOR="#00FF00"]NEWER IMAGES[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://98whdsnd.ddns.net:5555/images/n1.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://98whdsnd.ddns.net:5555/images/n2.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://98whdsnd.ddns.net:5555/images/n3.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://98whdsnd.ddns.net:5555/images/n4.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://98whdsnd.ddns.net:5555/images/n5.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://98whdsnd.ddns.net:5555/images/n6.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://98whdsnd.ddns.net:5555/images/n7.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://98whdsnd.ddns.net:5555/images/n8.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://98whdsnd.ddns.net:5555/images/n9.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://98whdsnd.ddns.net:5555/images/new1.PNG[/img] [SIZE=4][COLOR="#FF0000"]Last Thread update: 1/02/2015[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]

[SIZE=4]Welcome to AncientDragonland Our goal is to make a server based on the community’s thoughts it appears most server players don’t have a choice for what content is being added to the server, This is where we come in We have a system setup so players can get there suggestions added to the server if the rest of the community likes the idea, First They post a thread explaining everything they can about the idea, Then we let the community view/comment on those threads players make for a total of 1 week before the thread gets locked, if players want it, but small changes to it thats fine to, we then put a poll up and only admins + can create threads on poll thread, The poll is then placed in every page of the forum, so players are for sure going to see it. SO COME ON A TRY ADL![/SIZE]
